name: Supercharging NFTs
description:
This animated piece was fully created in virtual reality using an app called Tvori. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1WN_zvbompA
It is the thumbnail of a medium article I wrote entitled "Supercharging NFTs with AR and VR" and a statement of its own existence: an NFT created in VR to tell a story of how VR can supercharge NFTs.
